post:
Hello everyone,

I'm looking to hire another support rep to pickup higher skill tickets (network, routing, linux trouble shooting, etc). I'm looking for someone to fill a 10AM-6PM GMT -7 M-F position. You'd be working with our head of support, Anthony.

The perfect candidate would have:

- Experience with cPanel and Directadmin. While we're not offering Buyshared plans anymore, Directadmin is a big part of our offerings.
- A good handling on trouble shooting and debugging. I need someone that can work at a problem, even if it means looking for ideas on stackoverflow.
- A good grasp of the english language. Other languages such as Spanish, Portuguese, & Chinese, would be a huge positive.
- Strong experience with Linux is a must. Windows is a nice plus as well.
- A good understanding of networking & routing. You can read an MTR, you've setup tunnels (GRE, WG, OVPN, things like that. If you've setup your own BGP routing, OSPF, static routing, that'd be a huge win.

Please PM me here with your resumes or just to talk things over.

Wage & perks to be negotiated in private. Please, no outsourcing teams. You must work exclusively for us. 

Francisco
